column119: The bidder has to accept and sign Form A and Form B of the tender and upload the same.
The bidder has to upload Manufacturers Authorization Form Annexure B
The bidder has to upload proof of Tender Fee
The bidder has to upload proof of Earnest Money Deposit
The bidder has to upload Undertaking for No gratification as per clause 1.7
The bidder has to upload Non-blacklisting certificate as per Clause 1.8
The bidder has to upload Undertaking on affidavit from the original manufacture as per Clause 16.8
